fxInfo_label: Women civil society participation index ordinal
fxInfo_clarification: These are ordinalized versions of the V-Dem women civil society participation index. The original index ranges from 0 to 1. These transformations offer three different ordinal versions with three (_3C), four (_4C), and five (_5C) levels respectively.
fxInfo_question: Do women have the ability to express themselves and to form and participate in groups?
name: e_v2x_gencs_3C /_4C/_5C
